mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT 1)) AS ROWNUM, A.DATASEQ, A.WORKDAILY_SEQ, LEFT(CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,1,2),':',SUBSTRING(A.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,3,4)),5) AS NOTOPERATETIME_FROM, LEFT(CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,1,2),':',SUBSTRING(A.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,3,4)),5) AS NOTOPERATETIME_TO, A.HANDS, A.MANHOUR, (SELECT COMM_CD_NM FROM SC_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_GRP_CD = 'ANOMALYDETECT_OCCUR_REASON' AND COMM_CD = A.CAUSE) AS CAUSE_NAME, A.CAUSE, A.CORRECTIVE_ACTION, A.NOTES, A.CREATOR, A.CREATETIME, A.EVENT, A.EVENTUSER, A.EVENTTIME, A.ISUSABLE, B.TID FROM DSP_NOTOPERATE_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND WORKDAILY_SEQ = #{workdailySeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DSP_NOTOPERATE_CONTENTS ( WORKDAILY_SEQ , NOTOPERATETIME_FROM , NOTOPERATETIME_TO , HANDS , MANHOUR , CAUSE ,CORRECTIVE_ACTION ,CREATOR ,CREATETIME ,EVENT ,EVENTUSER ,EVENTTIME ,ISUSABLE ,TID ) VALUES ( #{workdailySeq}, CONCAT(REPLACE(#{notoperatetimeFrom},':',''),'00'), CONCAT(REPLACE(#{notoperatetimeTo},':',''),'00'), #{hands}, #{manhour}, #{cause}, #{correctiveAction}, #{creator}, GETDATE(), #{event}, #{eventuser}, GETDATE(), 'Usable', #{tid} );
mapper.update:
